mapper.select: select u.userNick, u.userEmail, u.userImg, u.userLock,fd.feedNo, fd.userId, fd.feedContent, fd.feedImg, fd.feedImgs, fd.feedGoodCnt, fd.feedLoc, fd.feedDate, fd.feedUpdate, fd.feedLock, g.userId as isGood, q.userId as isQook from feed fd, good g, qook q, userInfo u where fd.feedNo = g.feedNo(+) and fd.feedNo = q.feedNo(+) and fd.userId in(select us.userId from userInfo uq, userInfo us, follow f where uq.userId = f.reqId and f.resId = us.userId and uq.userId = #{userId}) and g.userId(+) = #{userId} and q.userId(+) = #{userId} and fd.userId=u.userId ORDER BY fd.feedDate DESC
select * from reply where feedNo=#{feedNo} order by replyNo desc

select u.userNick, u.userEmail, u.userImg, u.userLock,fd.feedNo, fd.userId, fd.feedContent, fd.feedImg, fd.feedImgs, fd.feedGoodCnt, fd.feedLoc, fd.feedDate, fd.feedUpdate, fd.feedLock, g.userId as isGood, q.userId as isQook from feed fd, good g, qook q, userInfo u where fd.feedNo = g.feedNo(+) and fd.feedNo = q.feedNo(+) and g.userId(+) = #{userId} and q.userId(+) = #{userId} and fd.userId=u.userId and fd.feedNo = #{feedNo}
